name: tailwind
flavor_text: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.
effect_text_extend: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user's side of the field have their original Speed doubled.  This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect_text_simple: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
